page.title: 05FAIRS AND GALAS -HORBURY
page.content: Horbury and South Ossett have been swallowed up by the Wakefield Metropolitan District Council and Wakefield is the focal point for local people's leisure and shopping needs. The local area has maintained traditional fairs and street parades.In mid-June,1985 South Ossett celebrated its 50' Children's Summer Fair,whilst Horbury's Gala and Street Fair was held on the same day.Netherton and Middlestown also hold annual gala's with stalls and sideshows,competitions,marches and musical entertainments. Many local schools are involved or hold their own galas.The money raised is used to buy equipment for the school.
